headers.subject: [tosdr:3367] Mimo Baby Monitor | Rating proposals

html:
Hi everyone.

Here are my rating proposals for Mimo Baby Monitor.

[Here is my open question].

I hope this can help the conversation.

Thanks,

Alessandro



01
Title:
You can use our Services without revealing any Personal Information about yourself.
rank:
good
description:
As Rest Device Inc. claims on the privacy policy: “In general, you can use our Services without telling us who you are or revealing any Personal Information about yourself”. It probably means that registration is not mandatory but “”by doing so, [user] may not be able to take advantage of many of our Services' features and functionality” such as storying user’s records etc.

02
Title:
Your child’s biometric information will not share with third parties
Rank:
neutral
description:
Since Mimo is a cloud-base Baby Monitor that collects biometrical data Rest Device Inc., the organization behind Mimo, claims on the Privacy policy that such data are not disclosed to third parties.


03
Title:
Log information are not linked to Personal Information
Rank:
good
description:
As reported into Mimo’s Privacy policy: “We do not link this automatically collected data [e.g. Internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet service provider (ISP), referring/exit pages, operating system, date/time stamp, and clickstream data.] to Personal Information”.

04
Title:
Information stored in cookies are not linked to users Personal information.
Rank:
good
description:
As reported into Mimo’s Privacy policy: “we do not link the information we store in cookies to any Personal Information you submit while on our Website”.

05
Title:
Information gathered by clear gifs are not linked to our customers' Personal Information.
Rank:
good
description:
As reported into Mimo’s Privacy Policy: “We use clear gifs in our HTML-based emails to let us know which emails recipients have opened.” but  “We do not tie the information gathered by clear gifs to our customers' Personal Information”.

06
Title:
Location information are not shared with third parties (but probably mobile metadata would be linked to personal information).
Rank:
neutral/bad
description:
Information as “ device's type, number and the serial number of its chip ” are collected from mobile devices and/or computers .“We do not share your location information with third parties” but whether such data are linked to Personal information is not specified.

07
Title:
Registration information is linked to aggregate information
Rank:
neutral
description:
“We may also link your registration information to aggregate information about your usage of our Services, and we will use that information to understand how you use our Services and to improve our performance of Services to you”.

08
Title:
Profile information is shared with third parties in aggregated form only
Rank:
good
description:
Profiles are made by information gathered from “cookies, log files, clear gifs, and/or third party sources”. Such Profile information are not tied to Personal Information to “provide tailored promotions and marketing offers and to improve the content of the Website for you”.

09
Title:
When Personal Information is collected by third parties you will be notified
Rank:
neutral
Summarize:
As reported into Mimo’s Privacy Policy:  “You will be notified when your Personal Information is collected by any third party that is not our agent/service provider, so you can make an informed choice as to whether or not to share your information with that party.”

10
Title:
We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time with retroactive effect.
Rank:
bad
description:
As usual into ToS the organization  “reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time, and such change will apply with respect to information you provide or your activity on the Website after the change in policy”.

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Mimo Baby Monitor | Rating proposals
text:
Hi everyone.

Here are my rating proposals for Mimo Baby Monitor 
<http://mimobaby.com/legal/>.

[Here is my open question]. 
<https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/tosdr/PExbj62V4jE>

I hope this can help the conversation.

Thanks,

Alessandro



01
*Title:*
You can use our Services without revealing any Personal Information about 
yourself.
*rank:*
good
*description:*
As Rest Device Inc. claims on the privacy policy: “In general, you can use 
our Services without telling us who you are or revealing any Personal 
Information about yourself”. It probably means that registration is not 
mandatory but “”by doing so, [user] may not be able to take advantage of 
many of our Services' features and functionality” such as storying user’s 
records etc.

02
*Title:*
Your child’s biometric information will not share with third parties
*Rank:*
neutral
*description:*
Since Mimo is a cloud-base Baby Monitor that collects biometrical data Rest 
Device Inc., the organization behind Mimo, claims on the Privacy policy 
that such data are not disclosed to third parties.

*Rank:*
good
*description:*
As reported into Mimo’s Privacy policy: “We do not link this automatically 
collected data [e.g. Internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, 
Internet service provider (ISP), referring/exit pages, operating system, 
date/time stamp, and clickstream data.] to Personal Information”.

“We do not tie the information gathered by clear gifs to our customers'

neutral/bad
*description:*
Information as “ device's type, number and the serial number of its chip ” 
are collected from mobile devices and/or computers .“We do not share your 
location information with third parties” but whether such data are linked 
to Personal information is not specified.

07
*Title:*

*Rank:*
neutral
*description:*
“We may also link your registration information to aggregate information 
about your usage of our Services, and we will use that information to 
understand how you use our Services and to improve our performance of 
Services to you”.

08
*Title:*
Profile information is shared with third parties in aggregated form only
*Rank:*
good
*description:*
Profiles are made by information gathered from “cookies, log files, clear

Personal Information to “provide tailored promotions and marketing offers 
and to improve the content of the Website for you”.

09
*Title:*
When Personal Information is collected by third parties you will be notified
*Rank:*
neutral
*Summarize:*
As reported into Mimo’s Privacy Policy:  “You will be notified when your 
Personal Information is collected by any third party that is not our 
agent/service provider, so you can make an informed choice as to whether or 
not to share your information with that party.”

10
*Title:*
We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time with 
retroactive effect.
*Rank:*
bad
*description:*
As usual into ToS the organization  “reserves the right to modify this 
Privacy Policy at any time, and such change will apply with respect to 
information you provide or your activity on the Website after the change in 
policy”.
